comments: Equals row sums of triangle A143612. - _Gary W. Adamson_, Aug 27 2008a(n) = A175505(n) * A023896(n) / A175506(n). For number n >= 1 holds B(n) = a(n) / A023896(n) = A175505(n) / A175506(n), where B(n) = antiharmonic mean of numbers k such that GCD(k, n) = 1 for k < n. - _Jaroslav Krizek_, Aug 01 2010
references: T. M. Apostol, Introduction to Analytic Number Theory, Springer-Verlag, 1976, page 48, problem 15, the function phi_2(n).
L. Comtet, Advanced Combinatorics, Reidel, 1974, p. 199, #2.
links: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..2500
P. G. Brown, Some comments on inverse arithmetic functions, Math. Gaz. 89 (516) (2005) 403-408.
maple: A053818 := proc(n)    local a,k;    a := 0 ;    for k from 1 to n do        if igcd(k,n) = 1 then            a := a+k^2 ;        end if;    end do:    a ;end proc: # _R. J. Mathar_, Sep 26 2013
mathematica: f[n_] := Plus @@ (Select[ Range@n, GCD[ #, n] == 1 &]^2); Array[f, 43] (* _Robert G. Wilson v_, Jul 01 2010 *)
prog: (PARI) a(n) = sum(k=1, n, k^2*(gcd(n,k) == 1)); \\ _Michel Marcus_, Jan 30 2016
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Apr 07 2000
